sentences.en: " You've never been a sharp shopper.
sentences.cn: 柔嘉道: “ 你这人从来不会买东西.

sentences.en: And Jay seems to be quite an easy shopper.
sentences.cn: 周杰伦看上去不是一位挑剔的客人.

sentences.en: Don't allow your web visitor feel like that shopper.
sentences.cn: 确保你的网站访问者不会出现此种情况.

sentences.en: Each " false positive " reduces profits and angers an honest shopper.
sentences.cn: 每一笔被定为 “ 欺诈性 ” 的交易都会减少盈利,激怒诚实的顾客.

sentences.en: Even the emerging shopper is beginning to pull his weight.
sentences.cn: 就连新兴消费者也开始发挥出自己的力量.

sentences.en: Hong Kong is a shopper's paradise.
Jennifer: How do you like that mystery shopper job I got you?
sentences.cn: 珍妮花: 我介绍给你的神秘购物客这个工作 怎么样 ?

sentences.en: Male Shopper: I want one for my foreign friend.
sentences.cn: 男顾客: 是送给外国朋友的.

sentences.en: Male Shopper: Thank you. It is wonderful. I will take it.
sentences.cn: 男顾客: 谢谢, 真不错, 就要它了.

sentences.en: The shopper is the opposite of the mall fingerer.
sentences.cn: 他们是指那些和商场闲逛者相对的购物者.

sentences.en: The streets were crowded with shoppers.
Tsimshatui is also the center of the shopper's world.
sentences.cn: 尖沙咀也是购物世界的中心.

sentences.en: What Type of Shopper Are You?
sentences.cn: 看看你是哪种类型的购物者?

sentences.en: Yard sale shopper Larry Sutton pauses with purchases in Trenton , Ga.
sentences.cn: 乔治亚州特伦顿市场的一位摊主在摊位旁稍作休息.

sentences.en: You're a shopper who picks something up and then usually buys it.
sentences.cn: 他们是指那些拿起商品就要买的购物者.
